overview: Max (thick curly black hair down on his forehead) Mikael (close-cut light brown hair, orange shirt) Against a wall of French doors covered with thin white curtains, on a double bed with a blue bolster as a headboard, blue pillows, and a blue cover with white palm trees, over a white sheet with pink flowers, Max sucks Mikael; Mikael sucks and rims Max; Mikael tops Max from behind on his knees on the bed and in missionary position.
title: Casual Friday
